testSteps.description: Example 1: {departure=Parramatta, destination=Town Hall, departureTime=08:02, line=Western, arrivalTime=08:29, Tell=travellers when they will arrive at their destination}

children.description: Given I want to go from {Parramatta} to {Town Hall}
And the next train leaves at {08:02} on {Western} line
When I ask for my arrival time
Then the estimated arrival time should be {08:29}

userStory.narrative:
In order to plan my voyage more effectively
As a commuter
I want to know what time I will arrive at my destination

tags.name: Tell travellers when they will arrive at their destination
tags.displayName: Tell travellers when they will arrive at their destination

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I want to go from <departure> to <destination>
And the next train leaves at <departureTime> on <line> line
When I ask for my arrival time
Then the estimated arrival time should be <arrivalTime>
